categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Ariq Melvar was a male Human from the planet of Coruscant who served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. Melvar was posted aboard the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Executor and shortly after the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, Melvar was part of a group of Executor crewmen who were tasked with investigating the murder of Lieutenant Tanith Sorn.
